SEARCH
Package com.software.fitness_system.AdminControllers

Class UserManagementControls

java.lang.Object
com.software.fitness_system.AdminControllers.UserManagementControls
public class UserManagementControls extends Object
This class provides various administrative controls for managing user accounts, including instructors and clients. It allows creating, editing, deactivating users, approving pending instructors, and viewing activity reports.
Author:
Muath Hassoun

  • Method Details

    • fillUserDetails

      public static String fillUserDetails(String fName, String lName, String email, String userName, String password, String role)
      Creates a new user account based on the provided details.
      Parameters:
      fName - The first name of the user.
      lName - The last name of the user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      userName - The username for the account.
      password - The password for the account.
      role - The role of the user ("Instructor" or "Client").
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the operation ("Instructor_Added", "Client_Added", or "Fail").

    • verifyUserCreation

      public static boolean verifyUserCreation(String userName, String role)
      Verifies if a user account has been successfully created.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the account.
      role - The role of the user ("Instructor" or "Client").
      Returns:
      True if the account was successfully created; otherwise, false.

    • checkTheUser

      public static boolean checkTheUser(String username, String role)
      Selects a user account for subsequent operations.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account.
      role - The role of the user ("Instructor" or "Client").
      Returns:
      True if the user exists; otherwise, false.

    • checkNewData

      public static <T extends User> boolean checkNewData(T editUser, String fName, String lName, String email, String username, String password)
      Updates the details of a user by verifying and replacing null or empty values with the current data.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of user, extending the `User` class.
      Parameters:
      editUser - The user object to update. Must not be null.
      fName - The new first name of the user. If null or empty, the existing first name will be retained.
      lName - The new last name of the user. If null or empty, the existing last name will be retained.
      email - The new email of the user. If null or empty, the existing email will be retained.
      username - The new username of the user. If null or empty, the existing username will be retained.
      password - The new password of the user. If null or empty, the existing password will be retained.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the `editUser` object is null.

    • deactivateUser

      public static boolean deactivateUser(String username, String role)
      Deactivates a user account.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the account to deactivate.
      role - The role of the user ("Instructor" or "Client").
      Returns:
      True if the account was successfully deactivated; otherwise, false.

    • verifyUserDeactivation

      public boolean verifyUserDeactivation(String username, String role)
      Verifies if a user account has been deactivated successfully.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the deactivated account.
      role - The role of the user ("Instructor" or "Client").
      Returns:
      True if the deactivation was successful; otherwise, false.

    • checkPendingApplications

      public static boolean checkPendingApplications()
      Checks for pending instructor applications.
      Returns:
      True if there are pending applications; otherwise, false.

    • processApprovals

      public static boolean processApprovals(String[] usernames, Map<String,Instructor> pendingInstructors, Map<String,Instructor> instructorsMap)
      Processes the approval of instructors based on the provided usernames.
      Parameters:
      usernames - Array of usernames to approve.
      pendingInstructors - Map of pending instructors.
      instructorsMap - Map of approved instructors.
      Returns:
      True if any instructors were approved; otherwise, false.

    • verifyAccountActivation

      public static boolean verifyAccountActivation()
      Verifies if any instructor accounts were successfully approved.
      Returns:
      True if there are approved instructor accounts; otherwise, false.

    • viewAndVerifyReportsActivity

      public static boolean viewAndVerifyReportsActivity()
      Displays and verifies activity reports for instructors and clients.
      Returns:
      True if activity reports were successfully viewed and verified; otherwise, false.

    • viewActivityReports

      public static boolean viewActivityReports()
      Displays activity reports for instructors and clients.
      Returns:
      True if activity reports were displayed successfully; otherwise, false.

    • verifyActivityReports

      public static boolean verifyActivityReports()
      Verifies if there are any activity reports.
      Returns:
      True if activity reports exist; otherwise, false.
